com.salesforce.androidsdk.util

Class ManagedFilesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.util.ManagedFilesHelper

  • public class ManagedFilesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for listing / removing files "managed" by Mobile SDK.

      • getPrefixList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPrefixList(Context ctx,
                                                             java.lang.String dirName,
                                                             java.lang.String suffix,
                                                             java.lang.String extension,
                                                             java.lang.String excludingSuffix)
        Get "short name" (prefix) of managed files with the given suffix and extension that live under dirName excluding the ones with excludingSuffix. Instead of the file names, we return the "short name" or prefix i.e. the part of the name before the suffix / extension.
        Returns:
        List of names
